channel.title: How to run server on VPS
channel.description:
Hey veryone i've seen many servers running on VPS these days i just wanted to ask you all how to make server run on VPS thanks for all ur help.
P.S. I've searched thru forums but didint find guide to it

item.title: How to run server on VPS
item.dc:creator: @ltownerlt ltownerlt
item.description:
@ltownerlt wrote:

umm rich thats little complicated for me btw can i use linux vps or it must be windows vps? and please if you can contact my on skype: zombi_att or tell me ur man and i will write to you for more detailed info how to run server on vps[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 08:38:21 am[/size][hr]well??

Read full topic
item.source: How to run server on VPS

item.title: How to run server on VPS
item.dc:creator: @stuntscape stuntscape
item.description:
@stuntscape wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:4, topic:243404"]You have to change your IP address on the no-ip site to the IP address of your VPS, transfer your server files onto the VPS, download JAVA, fix the compile & run batch files to fit the VPS, and there you go.[/quote] what the dowload link for it?

Read full topic
item.source: How to run server on VPS

item.title: How to run server on VPS
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You have to change your IP address on the no-ip site to the IP address of your VPS, transfer your server files onto the VPS, download JAVA, fix the compile & run batch files to fit the VPS, and there you go.

Read full topic
